directions.step:
In a skillet brown pork with ginger. Add green onions; lower heat and cook, stirring constantly, about 2 minutes. Stir in sugar and miso; mix well. Continue cooking on low heat, stirring occasionally, for 10 minutes. Serve over hot rice. Makes 3 cups.
From a book of my mother's (Judy Hosey) titled <Senator Richard Matsuura's Favorite Recipes>, mostly Japanese and Hawaiian. Downloaded from Glen's MM Recipe Archive, http://www.erols.com/hosey.
